issue.title: blogtruyen.vn page not working

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 36

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blogtruyen.vn/c748867/vua-otaku-vua-ngheo-vua-nhat-nhung-co-ban-gai-xinh-dep-giau-co-nay-lai-yeu-toi-moi-la-chuong-31

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Location API

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The problem will be solved if I add filter `@@||img.datrangsang.net/images^$domain=datrangsang.net`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/204985820-0c652dcf-a38c-4fb5-b968-80328f6e472b.png)

</details>

<details>=
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> We need two screenshots. Please send report using AdGuard's feedback menu. I don't see requests to img.datrangsang.net

I reported this issue to the website and they changed their photo hosting domain. it worked again without the filter

issue.title: anifap.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://anifap.com/1405-collection-of-works-by-marrubi.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanifap.com%2F1405-collection-of-works-by-marrubi.html) ### Comment > Пользуюсь и десктопной версией. Расширения для браузера на компьютере не смотрел. Но проблема в том что в как в десктопной так и на мобильной внутри браузера не блокируют рекламу через нажатие на экран если не ошибаюсь называется click jacking. В uBlock origin нет такой проблемы, только у вас. Все новое все работает, фильтры почти все включены и обновлены все новая версия. issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

comment.body:
> Fix it button?

Yep.

> Is this bad I was curious what it does and didn’t know if it the update button yet so I pressed it is that bad doing it before the 1-2 hours?

Content blockers are part of the AdGuard for iOS. If they disabled, the app can't work normally.
You should turn them on in settings (iOS) - Safari - extensions - you'll see 6 extensions - turn them on.
More information there https://kb.adguard.com/en/ios/safari-web-extension#enabling-adguards-safari-web-extension.

---

All questions about AdGuard for iOS and how it works you can ask support@adguard.com.

Воркэраунд:

```
@@||doka.guide/html^$elemhide,jsinject,extension
[$path=/html^]doka.guide$$div[class="cookie-notification"]
```

comment.body:
> > Fix it button?
> 
> Yep.
> 
> > Is this bad I was curious what it does and didn’t know if it the update button yet so I pressed it is that bad doing it before the 1-2 hours?
> 
> Content blockers are the part of the AdGuard for iOS. If they disabled, the app can't work normally. You should turn them on in settings (iOS) - Safari - extensions - you'll see 6 extensions - turn them on. More information there https://kb.adguard.com/en/ios/safari-web-extension#enabling-adguards-safari-web-extension.
> 
> All questions about AdGuard for iOS and how it works you can ask [support@adguard.com](mailto:support@adguard.com).

So in 24 hours if I still can’t gay adult videos on the website without removing adguard because it’s being detected on the site

I can come back here and report it

comment.body:
> > Fix it button?
> 
> Yep.
> 
> > Is this bad I was curious what it does and didn’t know if it the update button yet so I pressed it is that bad doing it before the 1-2 hours?
> 
> Content blockers are the part of the AdGuard for iOS. If they disabled, the app can't work normally. You should turn them on in settings (iOS) - Safari - extensions - you'll see 6 extensions - turn them on. More information there https://kb.adguard.com/en/ios/safari-web-extension#enabling-adguards-safari-web-extension.
> 
> All questions about AdGuard for iOS and how it works you can ask [support@adguard.com](mailto:support@adguard.com).

Okay so now it’s getting weird the fix sort of worked there is moments of me refreshing the safari tab on my iPhone or retyping in the site that the website does not detect my Adguard when I click a video

but there is moments where it does detect my Adguard and I have to refresh the tab or retype and go to gaypornhdfree.com

Is there a reason this is glitching of a pattern from not detected/detected /not detected/detected

I kind of would like it work probably and not doing this pattern

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;

- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
